edu.biu.scapi.primitives.dlog

Interface DlogEllipticCurve

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DlogGroup
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DlogECF2m, DlogECFp
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BcAdapterDlogEC, BcDlogECF2m, BcDlogECFp, DlogGroupEC, MiraclAdapterDlogEC, MiraclDlogECF2m, MiraclDlogECFp, OpenSSLAdapterDlogEC, OpenSSLDlogECF2m, OpenSSLDlogECFp

    public interface DlogEllipticCurve
extends DlogGroup
    Marker interface. Every class that implements it is signed as elliptic curve.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)
